compliant.section: The session cookies are permanently lost when the browser closes.
compliant.legal provisions: Requirement for consent to store cookies on user's device - Session cookies are exempt as they are temporary and deleted when the browser closes.

compliant.section: The persistent or perpetual cookies are contained in your device until you delete them manually or it reaches to the expiration date you set up for retention period.
compliant.legal provisions: Storage limitation - Data shall be kept in a form which permits identification of data subjects for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which the personal data are processed

compliant.section: If there is an incident or situation that may cause damage to your rights, or if you discover any possible violation of the Policy, please contact us at +886-2-6615-8888 or Legal@wiwynn.com.
compliant.legal provisions: Notification of a personal data breach to the supervisory authority - Controllers are obligated to report data breaches to the supervisory authority without undue delay.

compliant.section: We will protect the identity and rights of the whistleblower by strictly protecting the relevant information of the whistleblower.
compliant.legal provisions: Communication of a personal data breach to the data subject - In situations where a data breach is likely to result in high risk to individuals, controllers must communicate the breach to affected data subjects.

compliant.section: In the event of a personal data incident that results in a breach of your rights, we will immediately process and investigate the incident and notify you in an appropriate manner once it is identified.
compliant.legal provisions: Notification of a personal data breach to the supervisory authority and data subject - Controllers are obligated to report data breaches to both the supervisory authority and affected individuals.

compliant.section: If you have any questions or suggestions about the Wiwynn Privacy Policy, please send an email to Legal@wiwynn.com.
compliant.legal provisions: Right of access by the data subject - Data subjects have the right to obtain confirmation from the controller as to whether or not personal data concerning him or her are being processed.

non_compliant.section: We also use cookies to gather information on the date and time of your visit.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation - Data must be collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes. Lawfulness of processing - Processing should be lawful, fair and transparent to the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the purpose of gathering date and time information and the legal basis for processing this data. Provide users with a clear and concise way to opt-out of such data collection if it's not essential for the service.
